betterquesting:10.desc:8:
I do not understand, it doesn't make any sense!
All the signs point to it, Skythern should be the final Shell. 
Looking at the will of all the Twilight beasts I have fought, their submission clearly was towards the Experienced Cori, the Fractallite monster at the head of Skythern.
And yet, its defeat changed nothing. Actually, it may have made things worse. Why are the Testificates now saying that they would not mind just giving up, and making a pact with the Twilight Horde?
What is going on? It is as if none of the enemies I defeated was actually defeated. Sure, recursion does that, but I have been using my powers to ensure this would not happen. Is this because I am dealing with Fractallites? Are there other rules to this game I have not been aware of?
Have I just been a fool, pushing a rock that was already in motion regardless of my actions? No it cannot be!
